mapper.update: update MEMBER set MPW=#{mpw}, MNM,=#{mnm}, MTEL=#{mtel}, MADR=#{madr}, MJOB=#{mjob}, MPG=#{mpg}, MPIC=#{mpic}, MCL=#{mcl}, MEM=#{mem} where MNO=#{mno}
mapper.delete: delete from CMEMBER where MNO=#{mno} and CNO=#{cno}
mapper.select: select MNM, CNO, MEM, MTEL, CMITR, CMAD, CMST, CMEMBER.MNO from CMEMBER inner join MEMBER on CMEMBER.CNO= #{cno} and CMEMBER.MNO = MEMBER.MNO order by CMST DESC
select count(*) from CMEMBER where CNO=#{cno} and MNO=#{mno} and CMST=1
